classification.rationale: Invoice submitted with invoice #, PO, amount, service period, and PDF attachment.

extraction.free_text_summary: Vendor submitted January freight invoice for PO-77123; AP should validate and process.

draft_response.subject: Re: Invoice submission – Jan freight services (INV 104992)
draft_response.body:
Hi Jules,

Thanks — we received INV 104992 for PO-77123 (USD 7,842.17, service period Jan 1–31). We will validate and process through AP.

Regards,
Finance Operations

classification.rationale: Vendor asking for payment status; references overdue invoice and PO.

extraction.free_text_summary: Vendor requesting payment status for INV 88713. Confirm hold reason or expected payment date/remittance.

draft_response.subject: Re: Payment status – INV 88713
draft_response.body:
Hi Sana,

Thanks for the follow-up. We’re checking the payment status for INV 88713 (PO-66210, USD 18,300). If there is a hold, we’ll confirm the reason and next action.

Regards,
Finance Operations

classification.rationale: Vendor requests bank change with account details + form attachment (high-risk change).

extraction.free_text_summary: Bank details update requested; must follow vendor master data controls and verification.

draft_response.subject: Re: Bank change request – Apex Industrial
draft_response.body:
Hi Meghan,

We received your request to update banking details. For security, we must complete verification before applying changes.

Please provide a callback number and preferred time for verification. Once validated, we will process the update and confirm completion.

Regards,
Vendor Master Data – Finance Ops
questions_for_requester: Provide callback number + preferred contact time for verification.
Confirm the attached form is signed/authorized.

classification.rationale: Forwarded invoice rejection; price mismatch between PO and invoice; GR posted.

fields.details: Invoice line 2 price $125/unit vs PO $118/unit; GR posted for full qty.

extraction.free_text_summary: Invoice blocked due to mismatch; need PO amendment or documented approval for variance handling.

draft_response.subject: Re: Invoice rejected – PO-55219 / INV 55501
draft_response.body:
Hi Kunal,

INV 55501 for PO-55219 is blocked due to a price mismatch (invoice $125/unit vs PO $118/unit). Since GR is posted, we need either a PO update to the approved price or written approval to proceed per AP variance policy.

Regards,
Finance Operations
questions_for_requester: Is $125/unit the approved price? If yes, update PO-55219 or provide written approval to proceed.

classification.rationale: Employee reports expense report returned; includes ER ID, amount, employee ID.

extraction.free_text_summary: Expense report returned; likely missing receipt/policy support. Advise specific correction steps.

draft_response.subject: Re: Expense report ER-019332 – returned
draft_response.body:
Hi Lena,

Thanks — ER-019332 was returned due to missing/invalid support on one or more line items. Please check the return note in the expense tool and re-upload the required receipt(s) where prompted.

If you paste the flagged line(s), we can confirm exactly what is needed.

Regards,
Finance Operations
questions_for_requester: Which line item(s) show ‘missing receipt’ or ‘policy exception’ in the tool?

classification.rationale: Internal request to generate customer invoice; includes customer ID, PO, amount, urgency.

extraction.free_text_summary: AR invoice requested for BlueNova Retail shipment tied to PO 900771; needed by EOD.

draft_response.subject: Re: Customer invoice needed – BlueNova Retail (PO 900771)
draft_response.body:
Hi Marcos,

Received. We’ll generate the invoice for BlueNova Retail (C-100882) against PO 900771 for USD 42,500.

Please confirm the shipment reference / delivery note number to tie to the invoice.

Regards,
AR Billing – Finance Ops
questions_for_requester: Confirm shipment reference / delivery note number.

classification.rationale: Cash misapplied; includes bank ref, correct/incorrect customer, amount.

extraction.free_text_summary: Payment applied to wrong customer; reapply using bank reference 24021988.

draft_response.subject: Re: Cash reapplication – Summit Fiber payment
draft_response.body:
Hi Jenna,

Got it. We’ll reapply the USD 9,880 payment (bank ref 24021988, Feb 4) to the correct customer account and confirm once updated.

Regards,
Cash Application – Finance Ops

classification.rationale: Customer requests credit memo for damaged goods; provides invoice, PO, amount, reason.

extraction.free_text_summary: Credit memo request for damaged items; require photos/claim reference and approval before issuance.

draft_response.subject: Re: Credit memo request – INV 33018
draft_response.body:
Hello Angela,

Thanks — we received the credit memo request for INV 33018 (PO 900771) for USD 1,200 due to damaged items.

Please share photos and any claim/reference number. Once validated and approved, we’ll issue the credit memo and confirm.

Regards,
AR Adjustments – Finance Ops
questions_for_requester: Please share photos and the claim/reference number (if available).

classification.rationale: JE request includes entity, effective date, accounts, amount, and reason.

fields.description: Reclass freight accrual portion from 6100 to 6125

extraction.free_text_summary: GL JE reclass request for Jan close; post and confirm JE number.

draft_response.subject: Re: Journal entry request – freight reclass (Jan close)
draft_response.body:
Hi Ravi,

Received. We’ll prepare and post the JE for US01 effective 2026-01-31: Dr 6125 / Cr 6100 for USD 27,400.

We’ll reply with the JE number once posted.

Regards,
GL Accounting – Finance Ops
questions_for_requester: Confirm cost center/segment if required by GL structure.

classification.rationale: Close team requests variance explanation and whether it reverses in Feb.

extraction.free_text_summary: Close support request: explain AP accrual variance + reversal expectation.

draft_response.subject: Re: Close support – AP accrual variance (US01)
draft_response.body:
Hi Nadia,

Acknowledged. We’ll review the AP accrual variance (US01, Acct 210200, +USD 84,600) and provide a driver summary and whether it reverses in Feb based on posting timing.

Regards,
Finance Operations
questions_for_requester: Do you need the commentary in a specific close template format?

classification.rationale: Follow-up asking if invoice was received/processing; references prior invoice number.

extraction.free_text_summary: Vendor follow-up: confirm invoice receipt and whether it is in process.

draft_response.subject: Re: Invoice follow-up – INV 104992
draft_response.body:
Hi Jules,

Yes — we received INV 104992 and it is currently in AP processing/validation. If anything is needed (e.g., tax detail or remittance contact), we’ll reach out.

Regards,
Finance Operations

classification.rationale: Vendor requests remittance advice for a payment related to invoice; typical AP payments inquiry.

extraction.free_text_summary: Vendor requests remittance advice for reconciliation.

draft_response.subject: Re: Remittance advice – NorthPeak Chemicals
draft_response.body:
Hi Sana,

Understood. We’ll provide remittance advice for the payment related to INV 88713 and send it shortly.

Regards,
AP Payments – Finance Ops
questions_for_requester: If multiple invoices were included in the payment, please confirm which ones you need remittance for.
